analyzed: eka citta khaṇikā sabbe dhammā ti

original: Citte mahāpathavī saṇṭhāti, mahāsamuddo saṇṭhāti, sinerupabbatarājā saṇṭhāti, āpo saṇṭhāti, tejo saṇṭhāti, vāyo saṇṭhāti, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatayo saṇṭhahantīti?
analyzed: citte mahā pathavī saṇṭhāti mahā samuddaḥ saṇṭhāti sineru pabbata rājā saṇṭhāti āpaḥ saṇṭhāti tejaḥ saṇṭhāti vāyo saṇṭhāti tiṇakaṭṭhavana patayaḥ saṇṭhahanti iti
eka citta khaṇikā sabbe dhammā ti

original: “ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā na āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: ajjhattikam ca iva āvuso cakkhum a paribhinnam hoti bāhirā ca rūpā na āpātham āgacchanti no ca tajjaḥ samannāhāro hoti na iva tāva tajjassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: ajjhattikam ca iva āvuso cakkhum a paribhinnam hoti bāhirā ca rūpā āpātham āgacchanti no ca tad jo samannāhāraḥ hoti na iva tāva tad jassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Yato ca kho, āvuso, ajjhattikañceva cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti, evaṁ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
analyzed: yatas ca kho āvuso ajjhattikam ca iva cakkhum a paribhinnam hoti bāhirā ca rūpā āpātham āgacchanti tad jo ca samannāhāraḥ hoti evam tad jassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti iti

original: “ajjhattiko ceva, āvuso, kāyo aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbā na āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca …pe…
analyzed: ajjhattikaḥ ca iva āvuso kāyaḥ a paribhinnaḥ hoti bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbāḥ na āpātham āgacchanti no ca pe

original: ajjhattiko ceva, āvuso, kāyo aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca …pe…
analyzed: ajjhattikaḥ ca iva āvuso kāyaḥ a paribhinnaḥ hoti bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbāḥ āpātham āgacchanti no ca pe

original: yato ca kho, āvuso, ajjhattiko ceva kāyo aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti, evaṁ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
analyzed: yatas ca kho āvuso ajjhattikaḥ ca iva kāyaḥ a paribhinnaḥ hoti bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbāḥ āpātham āgacchanti tad jo ca samannāhāraḥ hoti evam tad jassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti iti
eka citta khaṇikā sabbe dhammā ti

original: Sabbe dhammā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammāti?
analyzed: sabbe dhammā niccā dhuvā sassatā a vipariṇāma dhammā ti

atthi kiñci sayojanam a pahāya parinibbāna
